service_clients module¶

Clients for various Internet services.

service_clients.fuzzy_address_uuid(addr_str)[source]¶

Get DAWA UUID from string using the ‘datavask’ API.

service_clients.get_address_from_service(dawa_service, address)[source]¶

Get DAWA UUID from dictionary with correct fields.

service_clients.get_cvr_data(cvr_number)[source]¶

Get CVR data from Serviceplatformen.

service_clients.report_error(error_message, error_stack=None, error_object=None)[source]¶

Report error, logging to file and sending to an AMQP Queue.

The AMQP queue will decide what to do with the various errors depending on their gravity - e.g inform users by email, log to a special log or discard.
